chat.assistant_description: Tap the input below to start a conversation. You can ask me anything about my experience, skills, or personal journey.
chat.connection_failed: Connection to Fares's Digital Mind Failed
chat.initial_greeting: Hello! I am Fares's AI assistant. Ask me anything about his background, skills, or projects.

privacy.title: Privacy Protocol
privacy.section1_content: We only collect the name and message you voluntarily provide in the contact section. If you sign in with Google, we access only your basic profile information (name and email) to offer a personalized interface.
privacy.section2_content: Your messages are encrypted and stored securely using Supabase. We do not share your personal information with third parties or use it for advertising.
privacy.section3_content: This site is a professional portfolio. All data flows are initiated by the user. Signing in with Google is optional and not required to view the content.
privacy.section4_content: You can request the deletion of any messages you have sent by contacting Fares directly via LinkedIn or email.

notes.title: Direct Link to Fares
notes.subtitle: Secure Neural Transmission
notes.message_placeholder: Type your message for Fares here...
notes.rate_limited: Slow down! Too many neural transmissions for Fares. Please wait a moment.
notes.privacy_note: Only Fares can decrypt and read this message.
notes.error_disrupted: Neural link disrupted. Your note couldn't be transmitted to Fares's digital mind right now.
notes.error_archive: Archive connection failed. Your note couldn't be stored in Fares's database.

cookies.title: Neural Cookies
cookies.description: Fares uses minimal cookies to secure your session and personalize your neural interface. No hidden tracking is deployed.

admin.title: Fares's Neural Notes
admin.purge_description: This action will permanently delete this note from the archive. This process is irreversible.
